_xResult.title: Secret Warrior Kaftan
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made wrapped kimono with piping detail
_xResult.longdesc:
The mystery is alive and well when you adorn this bespoke specialized kaftan/caftan crafted specifically with you in mind. Sleuthy sillhouttes flash in shadows on the wall. A breeze picks up the train as you glide down the shore of a beach. A pop of color catches the suitors eye as you slip into the hotel room. A glimpse is all they need, yet you are imprinted in their mind forever. Don't let moments pass unnoticed in this artfully crafted garment.

 

Aiste custom made to measure jackets fit better and can be customized for length in most cases. Have sloping shoulders, or one higher than the other? Let us know and we can make adjustments.

properties.propvalue: Spot clean and hand wash cold. Dry clean ok.
